author: Vaclav Havel
message: Work for something because it is good, not just because it stands a chance to succeed.
title: Thought of the day

author: Carl Jung
message: Knowledge rests not upon truth alone, but upon error also.
title: Thought of the day

author: Katherine Mansfield
message: Make it a rule of life never to regret and never to look back. Regret is an appalling waste of energy; you can't build on it; it's only for wallowing in.
title: Thought of the day

author: Victoria Holt
message: Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
title: Thought of the day
